text: "One Way of Another" is a 1979 song by American band Blondie and is the sixth single from their third studio album Parallel Lines. It went to number 24 in the United States, number 7 in Canada and number 98 in the United Kingdom in 2013. It was covered by One Direction in 2013 and went to number 1 in the United Kingdom, Denmark, Ireland and Poland. It made number 3 in New Zealand and Australia and number 13 in the United States. ==Track listing== ;US 7" (CHS 2336) # "One Way or Another" (Nigel Harrison, Debbie Harry) – 3:31 # "Just Go Away" (Harry) – 3:21 ;US 12" promo (CHS 10 PDJ) # "One Way or Another" (Harrison, Harry) – 3:31 ===One Direction version=== ===Track listing=== * Digital download # "One Way or Another (Teenage Kicks)" – 2:37 # "One Way or Another (Teenage Kicks)" – 3:07 # "One Way or Another (Teenage Kicks)" – 2:37 * Digital download (Live version)iTunes Store # "One Way or Another (Teenage Kicks)" – 3:20 == References == Category:1979 songs Category:Blondie (band) songs Category:One Direction songs Category:Power pop songs Category:Punk rock songs
title: One Way or Another
